marklogic.body: Well, your post is mostly hyperbole, but you do have a point.Â In past centuries, women cinched themselves into whalebone corsets that caused them to Faint and squeezed their internal organs together so much that they developed major medical problems.Â Womens' clothing today, while not exactly practical, is at least much less restrictive.Â And yet shoes lag behind in offering Comfort and practicality.Â But there are practical clothes and shoes available that are still attractive.Â It remains for some women to get their heads into the current millenium.
